short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds cat ears to the logos of major websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Behold, the glorious Cat Ears Extension! This browser extension adds cat ears to the logos of many popular websites including, but not limited to, YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, and more! Add some joy to your browsing experience by installing this extension now!
